splash.track-bp-bs-meds: Track your BP, blood sugar and medicines
consent.using-this-app: By using this app, you confirm that you are only entering your own information or are authorized to enter information on behalf of others.
consent.any-data-stored: Any data you enter into this app is stored locally on your device and is not transmitted to the creator of this app or any other party. Anonymous analytical data about your use of the app may be tracked and transferred to the creator of this app.
consent.more-information: More information about how we secure data and ensure privacy can be found {here}.
consent.medical-disclaimer: The use of this app should not be construed as medical advice and is not a replacement for a doctor or other healthcare professional. All blood pressure and blood sugar labels, such as "high", "normal", or "low", are consistent with generally accepted measures for labelling blood pressure and blood sugar and are not given as specific medical advice for individuals. Please consult your doctor while or before using this app.
login.have-a-paper: Have a paper BP Passport card from your doctor?
login.by-using-app: By using this app, you agree to our {privacy} and {terms}.
login.allow-camera-access: Please allow camera access in settings
scan-bp-passport.hold-camera: Hold camera over this symbol on BP Passport
scan-bp-passport.dont-have-phone-number: Please contact the hospital where you get your BP measured and ask a nurse to add a phone number to your Simple account.
verify-pin.please-verify:
Enter the 6 digit verification code sent
to the phone number associated with
your Simple account
add-bs.please-enter-error: Please enter a blood sugar value
settings.name: Name
settings.have-a-passport: Have a paper BP Passport card from your doctor?
general.bp-sheet-high-disclaimer: High blood pressure is at or above {limit}. Note, your personal "high" blood pressure may be different. Discuss with your doctor.
general.bp-sheet-normal-disclaimer: Normal blood pressure is below {limit}. Note, your personal "normal" blood pressure may be different. Discuss with your doctor.
general.bs-sheet-high-disclaimer: High "{label}" blood sugar is at or above {limit}. Note, your personal "high" blood sugar may be different. Discuss with your doctor.
general.bs-sheet-normal-disclaimer: Normal "{label}" blood sugar is below {limit}. Note, your personal "normal" blood sugar may be different. Discuss with your doctor.
general.delete-bp-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this BP?
bs.after-eating-description: Ate or drank in last 7 hours
bs.before-eating-description: No food or drink for 8 hours
bs.select-rbs-if-unsure: Select RBS if youâ€™re not sure
bs.delete-bs-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this blood sugar?
medicine.delete-confirm: This will permanently delete the medicine. Are you sure?
medicine.allow-notifications-body: Allow notifications to receive medicine reminders
alert.title: Get medical help
alert.description-high: Your {label} is very high. Contact a doctor urgently to get your health checked.
alert.description-low: Your blood sugar is very low. Eat sugary foods, like fruit, to raise your blood sugar and contact a doctor urgently.
health-reminders.title: Health reminders
health-reminders.app: Bring your app to every doctor visit to share your readings
health-reminders.check: Check, don't guess, if your BP or blood sugar feels too high or low
health-reminders.sugar: Carry sugary foods, like fruits, to treat low blood sugar
health-reminders.healthy: Watch your readings to eat healthier and exercise more
health-reminders.doctor: Talk to your doctor to set goals and learn how to take accurate BP and blood sugar readings
write-a-review.title: Write a review
write-a-review.description: Rate us on the {store} and let us know what you think
